# handleActiveWorkoutRecovery()

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the app relaunches after crashing during an active workout session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func handleActiveWorkoutRecovery()
```

## Discussion

To recover from a crash, call your HealthKit store’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/HealthKit/HKHealthStore/recoverActiveWorkoutSession(completion:)] method to receive a new workout session. You can then set up your data source and delegate as described in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/HealthKit/running-workout-sessions#Start-a-session].

## Related Documentation

- **recoverActiveWorkoutSession(completion:)**: Recovers an active workout session.

## Handling a workout session

- **handle(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the user started a workout session on the paired iPhone.
